module.title: Resource: Geolocation
module.description:
Supports OpenGeoDB.
This module includes OpenGeoDB with some extensions: list> - country data only for germany - new postcodes model and data <list
In order to use this base data, you will need to install SQL scripts: list> - geodb.sql - postcodes.sql <list manually, since automatic unzipping and loading is not implemented right now.
Otherwise please install the geo database dump fitting to your needs on your own.
module.log: Add database dumps of geodb and postcodes (~8MB).
module.author: Christian Würker
